name: Alone In Space (itch) (vemalsar)
description:
Intro

Explore this short sci-fi story with lots of interactivity, interesting plot, a score system and (at least) two endings ;) Enjoy!

Controls

Arrow keys or left click to move, space bar or left click to interact. Press Esc for the inventory and character screen and to save your game!

P.S.: I experienced problems on mobile, so I suggest to play it in a desktop browser or you can download the Windows build of the game and start the standalone application.
